Шаходат является одной из влиятельных работников в своей организации. Шаходат, ее муж и сын не имеют средства для проведения церемонию обрезания ее внука. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4800 сомони для проведения церемония обрезания. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shahodat is 48 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia.  She herself works in as a masseuse in a private practice and has for more than 11 years.  She is a very experienced masseuse.  Shahodat is one of the most influential workers in her organization.  She, her husband and her son lack the funds to pay for her grandson's circumcision ceremony.  She is asking for a loan of 4800 KGS to cover the costs  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to fund her grandson's circumcision.

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is 24 years old and lives in Kakata Town, the capital city of Margibi County that is the highest-producing rubber plantation in Liberia. Tina is single and has three children, aged 2, 6, and 13. Her children are attending school and they all live at home. 

For the past five years, Tina has been operating a cook shop (restaurant). Sometimes, she has few customers, but most of the time she makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, cassava, etc. for her business. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, cassava, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Karim

texts.en:
Karim is married and has two children. He has received schooling to junior high school level. 

Karim sells provisions at Hohoe, which he has done for 15 years to support himself and his family. His wife is a seamstress. Karim uses his income for the general upkeep of his home and all other financial responsibilities. 

Karim will use the loan to buy crates of minerals, introduce the sales of other soft drinks, and buy cartons of Milo. With the new profits from his expanded business, Karim plans to save and acquire a shop.

loans.use: to buy crates of minerals, introduce the sales of other soft drinks, and buy cartons of Milo.

loans.name: Suraiyo

texts.en:
Suraiyo is very sociable and a good-natured woman. She is 39 years old. Suraiyo is married and has 3 children. Her husband is in Russia and she works at the telecom center as an operator. Her salary is not enough to provide the children with all necessary things and that’s why she has her own business selling household products. Some years ago she had a clothes sales business, but she changed her business. She sells her goods in the local market. 

For some last month, Suraiyo has had a problem with money, as her husband didn’t send money and she expended all her money for buying food and paying for children's education. She must buy goods for widening the assortment of her goods, but she doesn't have money for it. She is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni to buy goods for widening the assortment of goods. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy household goods for widening the assortment of goods she sells

loans.name: Mirsaid

texts.ru: Мирсаиду всегда хотелось быть богатым бизнесменом, так как он по профессии учитель математики и преподает в средней школе. Мирсаид женатый мужчина и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Его жена работает медсестрой в сельской больнице. Его жена очень добрая женщина и старается помогать мужу во всех делах. Итак, 16 лет назад он начал свой бизнес скотоводством и земледелием и весьма успешно ведет свой бизнес. Его дети помогают ему введение бизнеса. Он имеет 4 коровы и 2 барана. Он покупает скот с рынка, ухаживает несколько месяцев и перепродает по более высокой цене. Он должен отремонтировать свой старый дом, и поэтому ему не обходимо развивать бизнес и получить больше дохода. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 9000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mirsaid always wanted to be a wealthy businessman, as he is educated to be a mathematics teacher and teaches at high school. Mirsaid is a married man and he has raised four children. The children are adults. His wife works as a nurse at a rural hospital. She is a very good woman and tries to help her husband in all cases. 

So, 16 years ago, Mirsaid started his business of livestock breeding and agriculture and very successfully runs his business. His children help him in managing the business. He has four cows and two rams. He buys livestock at the market, takes care of them for a few months and resells them at a higher price. He should renovate his old house, and therefore he needs to expand his business and receive a higher income. 

Mirsaid requests a loan in the amount of 9,000 somoni for the purchase of livestock. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase livestock

loans.name: Ernest

texts.en:
Ernest lives in Kakamega county with his wife and six children. Kakamega county is located in Western Kenya, close to the Ugandan border. It contains the only tropical rain forest in Kenya, and the variety of the flora in the region makes it well-suited for beekeeping. It has one of the highest rural population densities in the world (in some areas, close to 600 people per square kilometer), which may contribute to the region's high poverty rates.

Ernest has been farming for more than 20 years, and is currently growing maize and beans, as well as cultivating tea plants. He is excited to work with Honey Care because he likes the way their hive technicians do hive inspections, and he enjoys beekeeping because "it is not time consuming and it is a well-paying business."

This is Ernest's first loan, and he hopes to use the proceeds to buy even more hives. His goal is to eventually grow his apiary to house 50 beehives. His hopes and dreams for the future are to be a successful farmer and to teach his grandchildren how to farm.

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Tikari Amaru Moqo Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “TIKARI AMARU MOQO” es nuevo pues está conformado por personas responsables y amables. Las reuniones del banco comunal van hacer cada treinta días en la casa de una de la socia. La casa está ubicada en la comunidad de Perka del distrito de Pisaq de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco. La mayoría de los socios son vecinos y tienen una buena amistad.

Los socios son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos.  Las actividades económicas de algunos de los socios a las que se dedican son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, venta de papa, venta de comestibles, venta de textiles y venta de comida. 

El socio Felix tiene 51 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Perka, él es un hombre trabajador y responsable se dedica al engorde ganado y equinos, él lleva a sus animales a vender a diferentes ferias en distintas ciudades de la provincia de Cusco, Urubamba, Anta y Calca. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  El socio Felix requiere el préstamo para comprar más alimentos como pastos, concentrados, vitaminas y otras cosas más. (Las personas que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografia llegaron tarde a la reunion).
texts.en:
Tikari Amaru Moqo Communal Bank is new.  It's made up of responsible and friendly people.  The communal bank meetings are going to be every month in the house of one of the members, located in the Perka community in the Pisaq district of Calca Province in the department of Cusco.  The majority of the members are neighbors and good friends.

The members are workers and entrepreneurs who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and with their daily effort give their children a better future.  The jobs of some of the members include, for example, handicraft sales, potato sales, grocery sales, textile sales, and food sales.

Félix, 51, lives in the community of Perka.  He's a harworking and responsible man who makes a living fattening livestock and equines.  He sells his animals in various markets in different cities in the provinces of Cusco, Urubamba, Anta, and Calca.  He has worked in this business for several years now and it's going very well for him.

Félix needs the loan to buy more food such as grass, concentrate, vitamins, and other things.

The people who appear at the bottom of the photograph arrived late to the meeting.

loans.use: to buy grass, concentrate, vitamins, and other food

loans.name: Maria Trinidad

texts.es: La Sra. María de 36 años, soltera vive con su hija y su mama. Ella tiene 7 años laborando en una primaria de la comunidad en la cual se siente a gusto porque ahí mismo tiene tiempo de convivir con su hija, ya que su pequeña es su motor de vida y por la cual trabaja a diario para que no le falte nada. La Sra. María quiere realizar mejoras a su vivienda ya que su mama le regalo un terreno detrás de su casa y en el cual ha construido poco a poco para así dejarle un buen patrimonio a su hija. En este momento solicita de nuestro apoyo para remodelar su baño.
texts.en:
María is 36 years old. She is single and lives with her daughter and mother. She has worked in a community primary school for 7 years, which she enjoys because there she can sped time with her daughter, since her little girl is her driving force and for who she works every day to ensure that she is not in need of anything.

María wants to improve her home  since her mother gave her a plot of land behind her house, where little by little she has constructed (a house) so that she can leave her daughter a good inheritance. At the moment she is asking for our support so that she can renovate her bathroom.

loans.use: to renovate the bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Donald

texts.en:
Donald lives in Kakamega county with his wife and seven children. Kakamega is located in Western Kenya and is famous for the Kakamega Forest, the only tropical rain forest in Kenya. It is a very good location for beekeeping due to the old growth trees in the forest and concentration of farms in the area, which provide bees with a variety of forage. 

Donald has been farming for eight years, and is currently growing bananas on his land. He is interested in working with Honey Care because they provide a guaranteed market for the honey his hives will produce. He is also excited to start beekeeping for two reasons: because honey is medicinal, and because he has always dreamt of doing beekeeping. 

This is Donald's first loan, and he plans on using the income from his hives to help pay his children's school fees. When asked about his hopes and dreams for the future, Donald said that he would like "to be able to help the needy."

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Renei Fe

texts.en:
Renei Fe is 60 years old and married with 4 children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a motorcycle transport service in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 4 years and earns 30,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 35,000 PHP to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. 

In the future, Renei Fe wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
Liezel is 36 years old and married with 2 children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a motorcycle transport service in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 3 years and earns 10,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase spare parts and tires. 

In the future, Liezel wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tires

loans.name: Ramil

texts.ru:
Рамилю  37-лет, он женат и отец 2 детей возрастов 5 и 8. Он более семи лет работает мастером по устонавлению  пола и потолков. Его труд способствует единственным источником дохода для семьи.  Ему необходимо накопить денег на образование своих детей. Его мечта высшее образование для них и реализация возможностей. 
Сегодня единсвенная сложность на его работе это отсуствие аппарата шлифовки для досок. Каждый раз когда у него новый заказ ему приходится брать аппарат в аренду и это лишьняя трата для него. С вашей помощью он надеется купить этот аппарат для шлифовки и ему необходима сумма в 1200 АЗН манатов.
texts.en:
Ramil is 37 years old. He is married and the father of two children of the age of 5 and 8. He has been a skilled worker in building floors and ceilings. His work is the sole contribution to the family's income. He needs to save up money for his children's education. He dreams of their higher education and realization of their opportunities. 

Currently the only complication in his work is the lack of a grinding machine for boards. Every time he has a new order, he has to bring a rented machine and this is an additional expense for him. With your help he hopes to purchase a grinding machine, and for this he needs an amount of 1,200 manat (AZN).

loans.use: To purchase a grinding machine.

loans.name: Arcelita

texts.en: Arcelita is 36 years old and married with 3 children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis, Occidental in the Philippines. She owns and operates an agriculture business which is planting and harvesting vegetable for sale in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 3 years and earns 3,000PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2011, and she has requested a loan of 4,000PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and also to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is 45 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school.

Monina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Monina has requested a PHP 22000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Monina has been raising livestock for 13 years and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Monina would like to save money to expand her business and continue her children's education.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 26 years old and married with 3 children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. She owns and operates an agriculture business which is planting and harvesting vegetables to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 3 years and earns 3,000PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2010, and she has requested a loan of 5,000PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her home and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Eleanora

texts.en:
This is Eleanora. She previously accessed an 10,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread and other materials needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures as well as in the education of her children.
 
She would like to apply for another 25,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies of materials like t-shirts (white and colored) and silk screen. She also sells chocolates and almonds for additional income. Her profits from her business will help her to sustain her family’s daily needs and her children's education. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Eleanora dreams of expanding her business and hopes to give her family a good future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God as she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more t-shirts (white and colored) and silk screen.

loans.name: Emy

texts.en: Emy is 25 years old and single. He lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. He owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting rice to earn a living. He has been in business for over 3 years and earns 8,000PHP every month. He joined GDMPC in 2011 and he has requested a loan of 10,000PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. He wants to expand his business one day.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
This is Janet, 34, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Filbert and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She works hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Janet operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg.  janet earns a living by getting supplies at wholesale prices and then selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php18,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Janet hopes that her business will continue to expand and dreams to have a good life.  She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda is 30 years old, married with 3 children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for more than 5 years and earns 10,000PHP every month. She joined  GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 13,000PHP  to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, sugar, coffee and eggs. In the future, she wants to improve her home and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell like canned goods, sugar, coffee and eggs

loans.name: Valdivia

texts.es:
Valdivia es casada y tiene tres hijos dos varones y un mujer que están en etapa escolar, vive en la casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y la cocina, la  habitación es de ladrillo y el piso de tablones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente Valdivia trabaja en el tejido de mantas en forma artesanal y el esposo trabaja en el transporte sindicalizado en trufi; las mantas las comercializa por la misma zona donde vive  y en la ciudad del Alto y también ayuda al esposo en los recorridos y rutas del lugar que están llenos de tierra y polvo, ya que la ruta son aledañas y periurbanas donde trabaja todos los días de la semana. El esposo es chofer sindicalizado trabajando de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto, ambos  colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, y educación de sus hijos.
El crédito lo requiere para la  compra de lana para continuar con el tejido de mantas, ya que en La Paz bajaron las temperaturas,  así obtendrá más ingresos que le  ayudarán a mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Dña. Valdivia es poder terminar su construcción de su casa y así  mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la tercera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Valdivia is married and has three children, one boy and two girls, all of whom are in school. She and her family live in their own home that has a kitchen, central living area and a bedroom. Their house has a brick floor and is located in the Llojeta zone in the city of La Paz.

Valdivia makes a living weaving traditional blankets, and her husband works as a syndicated transport driver in the cities of La Paz and El Alto. Valdivia sells her weavings in the neighborhoods near her home, as well as in the nearby city of El Alto. She also helps her husband navigate various transportation routes through dusty, winding roads in the region. Both parents work extremely hard to support their children and provide them with food, clothing and education.

With the support from this loan, Valdivia plans to purchase wool for weaving her traditional blankets. She hopes to take advantage of the upcoming colder season when temperatures drop significantly in La Paz and people are in need of warmer layers. Valdivia also hopes that this loan will help her to provide for her family and improve their quality of life. Valdivia’s dream is to complete construction of their home and improve her family’s quality of life. This is her third loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase wool for knitting blankets.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitacion, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Villa Armonia en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como empleado en una empresa instalando propagandas gigantes Panaflex en las calles por más de seis horas al día ya que con los ingresos que tiene debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, transporte y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para para la compra de herramientas (destornilladores, taladro eléctrico y destornillador eléctrico) para su trabajo ya que le será de mucha ayuda en las instalaciones .
El sueño de Ernesto es mejorar sus ingresos para poder independizarse y mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Ernesto is single an does not have any children. He lives in his parents' house, in a single room. The house is well-situated in the suburb of Villa Armonia in the city of La Paz.

He is currently working for a company installing large Panaflex advertising boards the streets, for over 6 hours every day, since with his income he needs to pay for food, transport and basic services. 

He is asking for a loan to buy tools for his work (screwdrivers, an electric drill and an electric screwdriver), which will be very helpful to carry out his installations.

Ernesto's dream is to improve his income so that he can become independent and improve his quality of life. This is the first time he is asking for a loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy tools (screwdrivers, an electric drill and an electric screwdriver) for his work installing Panaflex advertisements.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
This is Josefa. She previously accessed an 20,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

Josefa would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Josefa's profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. She also has a canteen for additional income.

Josefa dreams that her business will continue to grow and hopes to have good health to carry out all her responsibilities. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, which is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: José Miguel

texts.es:
El sauce un bello Municipio ubicado en el departamento de León, donde existen muchas personas emprendedoras, es aquí donde vive el joven José Miguel.  

José Miguel se llama el Joven de 34 años edad Luchador por su vida y la de su familia, se dedica a la compra y venta de productos lácteos.

comenta que sus cosas del hogar no solo las puede tener con sus ingresos sino que también las puede obtener a través de un crédito que le financie ceprodel y Kiva para este tipo de actividad, por tal razón solicito su primer financiamiento para la compra de un televisor y con lo poco que el gana podrá ir pagando con cuotas mensuales. 

Agradece a este tipo de personas que ayudan con crédito y que siempre piensan en las personas pobres y de bajos ingresos de darle la oportunidad de poder salir adelante en su vida.
texts.en:
El Sauce,is a beautiful town located in the district of León, where many entrepreneurs live. This is where José Miguel lives. 

José Miguel who is nicknamed "el joven" [the youngster] is 34 years old. He is fighting for his and his families' life. He sells and buys dairy products. 

He comments that he can get things for his home not only by his income, but also through loans financed by CEPRODEL and Kiva. 

For this reason he is asking for his first loan to buy a TV and with the little he earns he will be able to repay on a monthly basis. 

He is appreciative of the people that help with these type of loans who always think of poor people with low incomes, to give them the opportunity to get ahead in their lives.

loans.use: to buy a TV

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.en: Jhonny is 43 years old and single. He lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates a farmland, planting and harvesting rice for sale to earn a living. He has been in this business for over 6 years and earns 8,000 PHP every month. Jhonny has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2010, and now he has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, Jhonny wants to make improvements to his house and to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Altan-Erdene

texts.en:
Mr. Altan-Erdene is 30 years old and lives with his wife and 4 children in Ger (Mongolian hut), in Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. His wife Ganchimeg, age 33, currently stays home taking care of their newborn baby boy Enh-Erdene, who is 4 months old. 
Altan-Erdene's sons Erhembayar, age 15, Enhzul, age 11 and daughter Enhbilguun, age 6, go to local schools. 

Altan-Erdene has been running his welding service business in town since 2008. He is now building a house for family use and requesting a loan of 1,200,000MNT. This is to purchase insulation material and vacuum windows, in order to reduce heat loss during winter and stay warm. Altan-Erdene is well-experienced and well-known in his business. He plans on building his workplace in his plot of land in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase insulation material and vacuum windows, in order to reduce heat loss during winter and stay warm

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food-vending business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

She has been in this business for 8 years.

In the future, Rowena would like to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 29 years old, married with 4 children. Three of her children are in school. Merlyn is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Merlyn has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. Merlyn requested a PHP 19500 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Merlyn has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Merlyn would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college, and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime  es soltero,  tiene un hijo, viven en casa de sus padres, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa 16  de Julio de la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudió hasta el nivel secundario y actualmente  trabaja como chofer realizando viajes al interior del país.
El crédito lo requiere para  adquirir peluches para vender, así tendrá un ingreso adicional y cubrirá los gastos que tiene.
El sueño de Jaime es tener una tienda y distribuir al por mayor juguetes.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Jaime is single, has one child, and lives at his parents house. The house in located in the Villa 16 de Julio area of the city of El Alto. He studied up to the secondary school level and currently works as a driver, making trips within the country.

He needs the loan to purchase stuffed animals for resale. In this way he will have an additional income and will be able to cover the expenses he has.

Jaime's dream is to have a store to distribute toys at wholesale. This is the second time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and his first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy stuffed animals to improve his income.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is 42 years old, married, and has five children. For almost 15 years he has been planting and harvesting rice to sell, using his income to sustain his family's needs and invest in the business.

Reynaldo is now requesting a loan of P30,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. It will help him improve crop production, resulting in an income increase. Although a small farmer, he hopes to keep earning sufficient income for the education of his children so they can find good employment someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: A very hardworking mother and wife, Josephine is 43 years old and is from the village of Canogan, province of Isabela. To make a living, she has been managing hog raising for years. This is how the family gets their daily needs. Josephine raises the pigs for 3 to 4 months and then disposes of them in the nearest market. She hopes that she can see her children finish their studies. And for that reason, she is asking a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy new piglets and feed for her business.

loans.use: to buy new herds of piglets and feed

loans.name: Tito

texts.en:
Tito is a farmer from Pinopoc. He is married and has children to support. He grows rice and sell them to traders upon harvest. Tito usually gains PHP 15,000 each harvest season twice a year.  This goes for meals, bills at home and education expenses. 

Tito is now asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides for use in farming. It will help nourish his crops for a healthier growth.

In the future, Tito hopes to keep improving crop production to save for education expenses, and reserve money for future expenses of the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides to use in farming

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
This is Gemma. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy all the needed products for her business. She has been in this business for eight years now. The loan also helped her in sending her children to school. She and her husband are working hard to provide income for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 25,000 PHP loan to buy products such as herbal medicines and food supplements. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Gemma dreams that her business and income will be larger and hopes that all her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for herbal medicines and food supplements to sell.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.es: Nació el 3 de octubre de 1993, tuvo una niñez agradable junto a su madre y su padre, recuerda que compartían mucho en familia, solían realizar actividades familiares  los fines de semana, con el paso del tiempo a la edad de siete años nació su hermano menor, un compañero de juegos, travesuras y oficios de casa, aunque admite que tienen sus diferencias y a veces hasta disgustos, tienen una buena relación, claro es natural son de personalidades y caracteres distintos, en lo que respecta a sus padres se separaron hace 12 años, desde entonces solo vive con  mamá y su hermano, a partir de ese momento su mamá asumió todas las responsabilidades del hogar, y es por esto que considera muy importante destacar este hecho ya que ella ha influido mucho en su forma de pensar e interpretar el mundo, le ha enseñado que para  sacar los objetivos adelante se debe luchar por ellos con mucha responsabilidad, compromiso, amor y sobre todo esfuerzo, que no se debe dejar desanimar ante las dificultades por más duras que sean ya que si vale la pena puede que no sea fácil cumplir cada una de  las metas, por otro lado aunque a su padre a se le ha dificultado colaborarles económicamente, él siempre ha estado al tanto del bienestar de ellos, es cariñoso y comprensivo, siempre les inculca lo indispensable que es estudiar y capacitarse en alguna área que les guste y apasione, para poder realizar las actividades laborales con amor y empeño, siempre dice: “ Estudien por que el estudio es la única propiedad que no les pueden arrebatar” y esto es algo que también ha contribuido en el desempeño académico y personal de Paola; Por otro lado, realizo sus estudios primarios y secundarios en el Colegio Campestre Maximino Poitiers, allí conoció personas especiales y agradables que hoy en día son amistades  valiosas, de ellas también aprendió muchas cosas positivas tales como ser una persona alegre, sencilla y colaboradora, para ella cada persona que llega a conocer bien les regala una enseñanza, la etapa escolar fue una de las mejores experiencias que ha tenido pero esta finalizo el 30 de noviembre del 2011, día en el que se graduó, para ese entonces tenía claro que el próximo año empezaría a estudiar en la universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas, ya que afortunadamente había pasado el proceso de admisión, y así fue, pronto se llegó la hora empezó a estudiar licenciatura en Humanidades y Lengua castellana, comenzó con mucha emoción pero lastimosamente a medida que transcurría el tiempo notaba que no se sentía satisfecha con lo que estaba estudiando,  la verdad empezó a notar que no se sentía a gusto, pero aun así era consciente de que su única responsabilidad era estudiar y por ende tenía que dar lo mejor de sí,  al finalizar el primer semestre tuvo un buen promedio y por tal motivo le realizaron un descuento para el pago del segundo semestre, pero en ese momento se cuestionaba y meditaba si eso en realidad  era lo que quería estudiar, se proyectaba en unos años desempeñando la profesión y sinceramente no se veía en esa situación, después de pensarlo mucho, decidió hablar con sus padres para comentarles que no se sentía a gusto con la carrera y que creía prudente retirarse para estudiar otra área, al inicio se opusieron y se disgustaron, algo que la hizo dudar, pero con mucho respeto y firmeza les dijo: “si ustedes quieren que estudie eso simplemente porque es su deseo, ¿no creen que sería injusto y que al ejercer la profesión lo hará con frustración?” gracias a Dios bajaron la guardia y la apoyaron con su decisión, entonces fue cuando consideró cuestionarse sobre qué era lo le gustaba y donde lo podría empezar a estudiar, y entonces decidí comenzar a estudiar cocina en Campoalto, para ese mismo año inició clases en Campoalto en el mes de agosto, actualmente se encuentro en II semestre y como actividades extras realiza manicure a domicilio, vende productos de aseo, armo llaveros para una empresa que está promocionando sus productos  y lleva a un primo al jardín, de esta manera obtiene los recursos económicos para poder elaborar las preparaciones de cocina y tener parte del dinero para pagar la cuota claro que cuando no alcanza a reunir todo el dinero su mamá y a veces su papá le ayudan económicamente, desea culminar el técnico laboral en cocina y empezar a trabajar.
texts.en:
She was born October 3, 1993. She had a great childhood with her mother and her father. She remembers that they spent a lot of time with their family.  They used to do family activities on the weekends.  At the age of 7, her younger brother was born. He was her playmate with toys, pranks, and offices of the house. Although she admits they have their differences and sometimes fight, they have a good relationship. Of course it is natural that they have distinct personalities and characteristics. In regards to their parents, they have been separated for 12 years.  Since then she has only lived with her mother and her brother. Until now, her mother was responsible for all the household expenses. For this reason she feels that it is important to emphasize that she has had a lot of influence on her method of thinking and interpretation of the world.  Her mother taught that to reach her objectives she needs to work hard for them and she needs to have a lot of responsibility, commitment, love and especially strength. She should not be discouraged when there are difficulties even if they are very challenging because they might not be as hard to achieve them if they are worth pursing.  On the other hand since her father has difficultly contributing to their financial income, he has always been worried about the well being of the family.  Her father is loving and understanding. He has always impressing on them the importance on studying and to get trained in their area of interest and passion.  So they can worth with love and dedication, he always says “studying is the only commodity that no one can take away.” This is something that has always contributed to Paoloa’s academic pursuit. 

She has completed her elementary and junior high school studies in the “Colegio Campestre Maximino Poitiers” (Rural School Maximino Poitiers). There she met nice people that are not valuable friends. From these friendships she has also learned many positive qualities such as being a happy, non-pretentious, and cooperating person.  For her every person that she is allowed to meet in depth is a learning gift. 

The school stage was one of the best experiences that she has had, but this ended on November 30, 2011.  After she graduated she was certain that she wanted to go to the University of Distrital Francisco José de Caldas. Fortunately, she was admitted. Soon the time came for her to start school where she studied Humanities and Castillian language. She enthusiastically started her studies, but unfortunately as time passed by she realized she did not feel satisfied with the subject she was studying. Even though she didn’t feel connected with her studies, she knew that her only responsibility was to continue studying even though she did not like her career. She still gave the best of herself. When she finished the first semester she had good grades. Her grades were so good that she received tuition remission for the second semester, but she was meditating and questioning if this was her true passion. She was looking ahead for a few years and she did not consider herself working in this profession. After giving it serious consideration, she decided to speak with her parents to let them know that she was not satisfied with her chosen profession and she thought it was prudent to switch majors. At the beginning her parents opposed her decision, which made her doubt, but firmly and with a lot of respect she told them. “If you want me to continue in this major simply because you like it, wouldn’t you think it is unfair and that when I work on my career I would do it with frustration?”  Thank God they let their guard down and supported her decision. At that point she questioned what she would really like to study and where could she study. Then she decided to study cooking in Campoalto for that year to study in Campoalto in August. 

She is taking her second semester and as a side activity she does in home manicures, she sells cleaning supplies, she builds key chains for a company that is promoting their product, she takes her cousin to kindergarten, in these ways she obtains the financial sources to do her culinary work and have money for her tuition. Sometimes she can not afford all of her expenses and occasionally her parents help her financially. 

She wants to finish her studies and begin working.

loans.use: to finish her culinary academic program in Campoalto

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is a 60-year-old woman who runs a store to support her family. She believes that mothers need to sacrifice their own desires because they have a dream for their children. She is very loving mother. To provide for all the needs of her family she is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase canned goods, snacks, drinks and spices for her business. She hopes she can give a higher quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, drinks and spices for her business.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio's income comes from selling crops. He is a farmer planting and harvesting rice to sell. He had been in the business for over ten years now and earns about P15,000 each harvest season (twice a year). Gregorio is 49 years-old and married and had four children. Gregorio would like to improve his crop output but has had insufficient funds.  Therefore, he is asking for a loan of P30,000 in order to buy farm materials (insecticides, pesticides and fertilizers) to use in farming.

Gregorio would like to keep improving his farming business in order to provide a good education and better living for his family.

loans.use: to buy materials (insecticides, pesticides and fertilizers) to use in farming.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en: Mary Ann is 35 years-old and has been running a grocery store for the past six years. She is proud to have improved her family’s lifestyle. To ensure continued improvement in their life, Mary Ann manages her business with patience and perseverance. She is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan in order to buy additional groceries to sell including noodles, cheese curls, soft drinks and spices. She hopes her loyal customers will continue to buy her goods which will help her lift her family out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell including noodles, cheese curls, soft drinks and spices.

loans.name: Melecia

texts.en: Melecia is 40 years-old and the mother of four children. She sells dry goods including hair-clips, ponytails and lighters. This is the only source of income she has, so she needs to take good care to make her income. Due to financial constraints, Melecia is asking for a loan in the amount of amount 7,000 PHP in order to buy more hair-clips, lighters and ponytails. In this way, she may be able to increase her income, providing her family a good living.

loans.use: to buy more hair-clips, lighters and ponytails.

loans.name: Delgertsogt

texts.en:
Mr. Delgertsogt, 38 years-old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on ring fenced land. His wife and mother-in-law have been running a lumber sales business for a long time and have accumulated a  vast amount of experience. He himself has been doing interior construction work for eight consecutive years. 

Last year he began building a house in order to provide better accommodation for his family because the ger they now live in has deteriorated over the years and uses a lot of coal. Therefore, he is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT in order to purchase building materials such as planks, slate and crossbeams for the house roofing. As a result, the family will be able to live in a warm and comfortable place where they will burn less coal, contributing to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building materials.

loans.name: Gineth Mayleth

texts.es: Cuando pequeña le gustaba jugar mucho a la enfermera fue creciendo luego salió del colegio, e inicio su vida laboral para poder estudiar y con ello su primera opción fue estudiar  sistemas pero no le gusto y se retiro, tiempo después inicio un camino en el que su vida tuvo un cambio grande y marcado un día en una búsqueda por  Internet varias oportunidades de estudio encontró  y así fue como tuvo conocimiento de Campoalto porque también una prima estudio en este lugar y hasta el momento le ha parecido muy interesante y se siente muy contenta porque está estudiando enfermería que es realmente su pasión.
texts.en: When she was little, she liked to play pretend as a doctor, and as she grew up she left school and began her labor to be able to study. Her first option was to study systems, but she didn't like it, so she left. A while afterward, a major change began a new path for her. She was looking on the internet for various opportunities to get an education and she learned about Campoalto because one of her cousins had also studied in this place. From that moment on, she thought it sounded very interesting, and she feels very happy because she is studying nursing, which is truly her passion.

loans.use: to finish her studies for an Associates degree in Nursing with Campoalto.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena es separada  tiene un hijo, viven en casa en alquiler, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa Fatima de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella estudió hasta el nivel secundario y se dedica a la elaboración de una gran variedad de masitas dulces y saladas.
El crédito lo requiere para  el aumento de su capital, así adquirirá  los insumos como ser: harina, huevos, levadura, y demás.
El sueño de Elena es tener una confitería que sea muy popular en la ciudad.
Es la décima   vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la tercera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Elena is separated, and has one child.  They live in a rented house, located in the Villa Fatima neighborhood of the city of La Paz.

Elena has a high school education, and she has a business making cookies and salads. She needs this loan to increase her capital.  This way, she will be able to buy supplies such as: flour, eggs, yeast, and other ingredients.

Elena's dream is to have a pastry shop that becomes the most popular in the city.

This is the 10th time that she has taken a loan from IMPRO, and the 3rd time she has taken a loan funded by Kiva.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, and other supplies

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia continua con el banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS y agricultura donde seimbre diferentes tipos de verduras y tambien con la crianza de animales. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Lidia continues to be a member of the Communal Bank “Reyna de Los Angeles de Urquillos”. She grows different types of vegetables and also raises animals.

Lidia is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizers. She has been in this business for several years and is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Lidia is pleased with the loan and promises to complete the payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and merchandise.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилорому 32 года. Она добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она с детства любила упорно трудиться и помогать родителям. По семейному состоянию она не смогла поступить в университет и поэтому осталась без высшего образования. После замужества у нее возникли проблемы с деньгами. Ее муж простой рабочий и получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для обеспечения 2 детей. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес и таким образом найти источник дополнительного дохода в семье. Она очень обрадовалась, когда узнала о курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много новой информации об организации бизнеса. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания, так как продукты питания имеют большой спрос. Она живет в сельской местности, и поэтому там нет большой конкуренции. Ее свекровь будет помогать ей введение бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США для покупки продуктов питания. Она ждет и надеется на вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilorom is 32 years old.  She is a kind and hardworking woman.  Even as a child, she always liked to work hard and to help her parents. However, because of her family circumstances, she did not have the opportunity to go to university, so she has no higher education.

After getting married, Dilorom started to experience financial problems.  Her husband is a simple worker and his small income is not enough to provide for two children.  She therefore wants to start her own business so that she can find an additional source of income for her family.  She was very excited to learn about the course entitled "Achieving Successs", organized by the Association of Business Women.  She took part in this course and learned a lot of new information related to starting a new business.

Dilorom now wants to start buying and selling food products, since this type of goods is in high demand.  She lives in a rural setting where the competition is low.  Her mother-in-law will also be helping her with the business.

Dilorom is requesting a loan of $2,000 for the purchase of food products.  She is awaiting and relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy food products to start her new business.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Maria se dedica  a la fabricación y venta de cotillones y piñatas para todo tipo de acontecimientos ya sea bautizos matrimonios, fiestas de quince años, ella entrega a distintas tiendas, mercados, y también le hacen pedido para el decorado de fiestas,  es una cliente nueva de la institución , con el dinero del crédito comprara  material para la fabricación de piñatas y cotillones y así brindar variedad de cotillones a sus clientes , La Sra. Maria se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad que se le brinda para crecer en su negocio ya que con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien sigue creciendo en su actividad y de esta manera genera más ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Maria dedicates herself to the manufacture and sale of party supplies and piñatas for all types of occasions, such as baptisms, marriages, and quinceañeras. She brings them to special shops and markets, and she also makes special orders for party decor. She is a new partner at this institution. With the money from this loan she will buy crude materials to manufacture piñatas and party supplies and thus provide a variety of party supplies for her clients. Maria feels very grateful for the opportunity she has been provided with to expand her business. The earlier loan she had went very well and she continues expanding her activities and gaining more income for the wellbeing of her family.

loans.use: buy crude materials to manufacture piñatas and party supplies

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Doña Margarita es una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica vive con sus 2 hijos (22 y 8 años) en casa propia tiene varios años de trabajar en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés de la cual ha logrado sacar a delante a su hijos y los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca y todo lo necesario para elaborar mas pan y asi seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Margarita is a responsible and hardworking woman who is always looking to improve her economic stability. She lives with her two children (ages 22 and 8) in her own home. Margarita has worked in her own bakery for several years. She makes French bread in order to help her children get ahead and pay the household expenses.

Margarita is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of flour, yeast, shortening, and everything else necessary for making bread. As a result, she can continue improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, shortening, and other supplies.

loans.name: Taisir

texts.en:
Taiseir is a 24-year-old divorced woman who lives in Haja, Yemen. She is very hardworking. 

With much great effort and dedication, she has managed to save money. She is a hairdresser who intends to open a beauty salon. Taiseir said that without sacrifice, there is no reward and if one wants to get ahead, you have to do what you can. She believes that her business will do well. 

The amount of money she has saved is not enough to start up a beauty salon, so she applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy cosmetic materials and beauty salon accessories. With this loan, she will be able to open her beauty salon as soon as possible. 

In the future, she hopes to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic materials and a variety of beauty salon accessories to start her salon business.

loans.name: Javier Enrrique

texts.es:
Javier es originario de la linda e histórica Ciudad Darío cuna de gran poeta Rubén Darío, Javier es casado y tiene cinco hijos en edad escolar. Este señor muestra buenos valores morales, ya que es preocupado por el bien estar de su familia.

Actualmente Javier se desempeña como fontanero de una empresa de acueducto desde hace más de nueve años con los ingresos obtenido de su trabajo lo destina para la educación y alimentación de su familia.

solicita un financiamiento para la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como bloque y cemento ya que está realizando mejoras en su vivienda, manifiesta sentirse alegre y agradecido con kiva por el apoyo brindado ya que podrá darle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Javier is a native of the beautiful and historic city of Dario, the birthplace of the great poet Ruben Dario.  Javier is married and has 5 school-aged children.  He is a man who exhibits good moral values, and who is concerned with the well-being of his family.

At this time, Javier is working as plumber for a water company.  He has been doing this work for more than 9 years, and with the income he earns he pays for the food and education expenses of his family.

Javier is requesting a loan to buy construction materials, such as cement blocks and cement, because he is making improvements to his house.  He states that he feels happy and grateful to Kiva for the support that is being provided, because this way he will be able to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy a thousand cement blocks and cement to improve his house

loans.name: Adolia

texts.es: Adolia  tiene 51 años de edad, está casada. Ella el crédito lo quiere para la compra de mercadería para la soda y unos utensilios para cocinar las comidas para su posterior ventad. Ella quiere aumentar un poco la variedad de comidas y con ello aumentar las ventas y obtener más ganancias y una mejor calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Adolia is 51-years old and married.  She wants a loan so she can purchase merchandise and cooking utensils for making the food she will then sell in her cafe.  Adolia wants to increase the variety of food she prepares, which will allow her to increase her sales and earn a better profit.  This will give her a better quality of life.  This is the first loan Adolia has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has never before taken out a loan from a state bank, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan at better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase rice, meat and cooking apparatus.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy furniture

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is operating a business that requires determination and hard work. Her goal is to increase her family's income by getting a loan for PHP 7,000 to buy vitamins and feed for her hogs. 

This loan will help her achieve her dreams for her family and for the future of her three children.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Señor Nazareno Group

texts.es: El grupo “Señor Nazareno” está conformada por 07 socios responsable que llevan trabajando más de 02 años con el grupo. Margarita de 42 años separada con 02 hijos, la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos. Hace muchos años que Margarita se dedica a la venta de frituras como anticuchos, pollo, etc. Como actividad segundaria brinda servicio de cocina de donde obtiene un ingreso extra para su hogar. Con el fruto de su esfuerzo a podido mejorar su vivienda. Su mayor anhelo es de es de ampliar su negocio. Solicito el crédito para la compra de una parrilla grande, la cual le permita preparar sus  comidas con facilidad. El grupo “Señor Nazareno” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hacen posible su progreso. Margarita se encuentra de pie, es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo marón.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Señor Nazareno” is made up of 7 responsible members who have been working together as a group for more than 2 years.  Margarita, 42, is separated, and has 2 children, one of whom she continues to support.  Margarita has had a business selling fried snacks such as kebabs, chicken, etc.  

She also provides catering services where she obtains extra income for her household.  As a result of these efforts, she has been able to improve her home.  Her main wish is to expand her business.  She is requesting a loan to buy a big grill, which will allow her to easily prepare her food. 

The group “Señor Nazareno” is grateful for the loan that is being provided, which makes it possible for them to make progress.  Margarita is seen standing in the photo; she is the second from the left, and is wearing a brown polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy a grill

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Beatriz works hard to support her family.

She has a coffee shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from clothing sales.  Beatriz is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy sugar, coffee, and utensils for her coffee shop business.

Beatriz has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, and utensils.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
This loan will help Michael grow his ecological tree and land management company.

After working for the United States Forest Service as a wildland fire fighter in Arizona for six years, Michael returned to his home state of Pennsylvania to pursue his passion for preserving trees among urban spaces. In 2009, he began Preservation Tree, LLC, a company dedicated to providing sustainable solutions for land management in Southeastern Pennsylvania and Northern Delaware regions. Michael and his crew of three employees are working to restore native woodlands by removing invasive species, improving waterways, and replanting the areas with native trees and shrubs.

Michael is now looking to expand his business and soon hopes to hire an account manager. Michael needs a loan to purchase a new spray apparatus to organically spray lawns and trees and to invest in marketing and web presence in order to gain more clients.

Michael hopes that his business will one day be the premier ecological tree and land management company in Southeastern Pennsylvania. Visit his website here: http://prestree.com/

loans.use: to purchase necessary equipment, hire an account manager, and invest in marketing for his ecological tree and land management company.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en: Liza is 40 years old and married with five children.  She manages a vegetable production business in which she planted eggplant, squash, string beans, and tomatoes.  She has been in this business for almost 20 years, with a daily net income of 500 PHP.  She would like a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase vegetable seedlings, fertilizers, and to pay for the land preparation.  She is hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can utilize it immediately to gain more income.

loans.use: to pay for vegetable seedlings, fertilizers, and land preparation.

loans.name: Murodoy

texts.ru: Муродой 46 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Ее муж водитель. Дети Комрон, Робар, Обидджон и Собирджон совершеннолетние. Она много лет занималась домашними делами и воспитанием детей. Она очень нуждалась в деньгах, так как доход ее мужа маленький. Теперь дети выросли, и она имеет много свободной времени. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством, так как она помогала родителям скотоводством и имеет опыт по данному бизнесу. Она имеет у себя дома условию для скотоводства. Она будет покупать скот, присматривать несколько месяцев и перепродавать на местном рынке. Ее старший сын будет помогать ей введение бизнеса, так как он очень аккуратный и хозяйственный. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3500 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Murodoy is 46 years old.  She is married and has raised four children.  Her husband is a driver.  Her children (Komron, Robar, Obidjon and Sobirdjon) are all adults now.  Murodoy spent many years taking care of her home and raising her children.  During those years she always needed money, since her husband makes only a small salary.  

Now that her children are grown, Murodoy has a lot of free time.  She wants to start her own business raising livestock.  She has some experience in animal husbandry since she used to help her parents with this type of work. Her home offers the right conditions to raise livestock.  She intends to buy some livestock, keep it for a few months and then resell it at the local market.  Her oldest son, who is very detail-oriented and has a good sense of business, will be helping her to manage this new business.

Murodoy is requesting a loan of 3,500 somoni to buy some livestock.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy some cattle to start her new business.

loans.name: Unidos Al Futuro Group

texts.es: Cordiales Saludos. El grupo “Unidos Al Futuro” está conformada por 07 mujeres triunfadoras y solidarias, la gran mayoría de ellas vecina de la zona. Este es el caso de Esperanza una de las fundadoras del grupo, la cual se inicio brindando servicio de lavado de ropa, poco a poco fue mejorando y con mucho esfuerzo instalo su pequeña tienda la cual ofrece abarrotes y artículos de limpieza. Se siente feliz pues gracias a su esfuerzo sigue mejorando cada día. Su mayor anhelo es de llegar a tener una tienda surtida. El crédito obtenido lo destinará para la compra de detergente, jabón, lejía y abarrotes. Esperanza tiene 51 años de edad separada con 05 hijos independientes. El grupo “Unidos Al Futuro” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Esperanza es la primera del lado izquierdo viste polo rosado con rayas plomas.  Jaquelin no puedo estar presente por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
A group "Unidos al Futuro" ("United to the future") is comprised of 7 triumphant and supportive women. The large majority of them are neighbors. This is the case of Esperanza, one of the group's founders, who started out by doing a laundry service. Little by little, she improved, and with much effort she opened a small store that offers groceries and cleaning products. She feels happy, and thanks to her efforts, she keeps improving every day. Her greatest wish is to have a well-stocked store. The loan obtained will be used to buy detergent, soap, bleach, and groceries. 

Esperanza is 51 years old, separated, and has 5 independent children. The group "Unidos al Futuro" is thankful to the people who made this loan possible. Esperanza is the first one on the left side with a pink striped polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products and groceries.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda makes a living by caring for and selling hogs. She has been in this business for eight years, and is very dedicated to her work because this is how she supports her family. 

Her dream is to improve their living standards. To improve her life, she is requesting a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy feed and vitamins for her hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her hogs.

loans.name: Dorian Miguel

texts.es:
Dorían es originario de la histórica ciudad Darío la tierra natal del príncipe de las letras castellana Rubén Darío ubicada en el norte de Nicaragua. Dorían es un joven de 28 años de edad, su estado civil es acompañado y tiene dos hijos en edad escolar.
Este joven se caracteriza por ser una persona de buenos valores morales comprometido por el bien estar de su familia.
Actualmente es trabajador de una empresa de acueducto y alcantarillado desempeñándose como fontanero desde hace cuatro años, argumenta que se siente bien en su trabajo.

Con el monto financiado lo destino para comprar un medicamento para uno de sus hijos ya está mal de salud. Agradece a kiva por el apoyo brindado ya que de esta manera podrá comprar la medicina necesaria para su hijo y poder obtener la recuperación de la salud de su hijo.
texts.en:
Dorían is a native of the historic city of Darío.  Located in the north of Nicaragua, it is the birthplace of the Prince of Spanish Letters, Rubén Darío.  Dorían is a 28-year old young man who lives with his common-law spouse and has two school-aged children. 
This young man is known for being a person of good moral values who is committed to his family's well-being.
Dorían has worked, for the last four years, as a plumber at an aqueduct and sewage system company.  He says that he is happy with his job.

With the requested sum, Dorían intends to purchase medicine for one of his children, who is in poor health.  He is grateful to Kiva for the support he is being offered, with which he will be able to purchase the medicine his son needs to regain his health.

loans.use: to purchase medicine.

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en:
Eyad is from Iraq.  He is 33 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Eyad and one of his children provide the income for the family.
Eyad is a cowman and has a small farm.  He raises cows to sell dairy products such as milk, yogurt, and cheese.  He has been practicing this business since 2008 and he now he has an employee.  Eyad has gained an excellent reputation in his surrounding area thanks to the fresh products that he offers.

Eyad is requesting a $3,000 loan which he will use to buy 2 extra cows and to install a fence around his farm.  By buying these 2 new cows, he aims to increase his production and increase his profits.  This will help him to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows and install a fence around his farm.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 65 years old and married with 4 children.  She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur.  She sells fish in the local community to earn a living.  She has been in her business for over 8 years and earns 10,000 PHP every month.  Rebecca has been with GDMPC since 2009, and she has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase additional fish to sell.  Her wants and hopes in life are to have a better future and to improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Abdel Jalil

texts.en:
Abdel Jalil is a married Iraqi client.  He is 53 years old and has 5 children.  He and 3 of his children work to provide the family living.
Abdel Jalil runs a small business as a grocer.  He offers to sell all of the basic daily needs, such as snacks, soft drinks, dairy products, detergents, toothpastes, and canned food.  He has been in this field since 2008 and he now has an employee.  Abdel Jalil gained an excellent reputation in his surroundings, thanks to the quality of goods that he sells. 

Abdel Jalil is requesting a sum of 3,000 USD.  He will use this loan to renovate his grocery store by installing an external ceiling and signage.  He will also use this loan to buy 2 new refrigerators.  Abdel Jalil aims to grow his business so he will be able to provide his children a good future.

loans.use: to buy signage, 2 refrigerators and install an external ceiling.

loans.name: Las Flores Group

texts.es:
La señora Eyra Elizabeth es una persona comerciante que reside en uno de los barrios periféricos de la ciudad de pueblo nuevo ubicada al norte de Estelí a unos 45 km de distancia y reside en su propia casa de habitación junto a su esposo el que se dedica a la venta de carne fresca de cerdo y sus derivados, también reside junto a sus hijos los cuales están estudiando la primaria.

la señora Eyra Elizabeth es miembro del grupo solidario las flores, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas a base de maíz, ella diaria mente elabora unas 200 a 250 tortillas las que vende ahí mismo en su casa de habitación, cabe mencionar que ella tiene su clientela establecida la que son sus mismo vecinos. 

Ella diariamente trabaja en su negocio desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 del medio día de lunes a domingo ya que este es un producto de consumo diario. Este es su principal ingreso familiar y su sostén diario de la familia ya que ella asume parte de los gastos familiares así como de los estudio de sus hijos entre otras cosas.

 Ella tiene unos 12 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de tortillas, también elabora la comida típica que es el nacatamal, este solo los elaboran los fines de semana y tiene buena demanda por ser un alimento mus gustoso.

 una joven integrante de este grupo es la señora Elizabeth del socorro que también se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas a base de maíz la que también las vende en su casa de habitación y sus clientes son sus vecinos, también integra este grupo la señora Ivania que ella se dedica a la elaboración de helados de frutas, paletas, y helados de bananos cubiertos con chocolate llamado choco banano.

La señora Eyra se presentó junto a las otras dos miembros del grupo la flores, a la oficina de ceprodel a solicitar un financiamiento para poder ampliar su negocio. 

Si el crédito les fuese aprobado ellas comprarían más materia prima y de eta manera aumentar sus producción y por ende sus ventas, ya que tiene la suficiente demanda y por eso surge la necesidad de solicitar financiamiento y así mejorar sus ingresos y su nivel de vida familiar.
texts.en: Eyra Elizabeth is a merchant who lives in a barrio on the outskirts of the city of Pueblo Nuevo, about 45 kilometers from the city of Estelí. She lives in her own home along with her husband, who makes a living selling fresh pork and its derivatives, and their children, who are in elementary school. Eyra Elizabeth is a member of Las Flores loan group, and she makes a living making and selling corn tortillas. She makes between 200 and 250 tortillas a day and sells them herself out of her home to a regular customer base consisting of her neighbors. She works from 6 a.m. until 10 a.m. every day, since tortillas are eaten on a daily basis. This is the main source of income for her family, and she assumes part of the household expenses, such as her children's education. She has dedicated herself to the tortilla business for 12 years, and she also makes other traditional foods like tamales, which she only makes on the weekends and are in high demand because of their great taste. A young member of this group is Elizabeth Del Socorro, who also makes and sells corn tortillas out of her home. The other member of the group is Ivania, who makes fruit ice creams, popsicles, and a banana ice cream dish covered with chocolate that is called choco banano. The three are requesting a loan to expand their businesses by purchasing more supplies and in this way increase their production and, in turn, their sales, since they have sufficient demand. In this way they will increase their income and the quality of life for their families.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like corn and firewood.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
Eulalio un hombre humilde con gran visión de trabajo toda estas buenas cualidades caracterizan a este varón originario de la bella Ciudad Darío ubicada en la parte norte de Nicaragua. Eulalio es casado y tiene un hijo en edad escolar cursando la secundaria.

En la actualidad se desempeña como fontanero o plomero de una empresa de servicio de acueducto y alcantarillado por más de 15 años  esta antigüedad laboral demuestra la responsabilidad laboral.

Eulalio está construyendo un cuarto de habitación en su vivienda el ya cuenta con algunos materiales de construcción solicita un crédito a kiva por medio de ceprodel para la compra de cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra por la construcción del cuarto de habitación.

Agradece a ceprodel y kiva por brindarle el apoyo ya que de esta manera ha venido realizando mejoras en su vivienda y dándole una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Eulalio is an unassuming man who has a great vision for his work.  All of these qualities are embodied in this man, who is from the beautiful city of Dario, which is located in the northern part of Nicaragua.  Eulalio is married and has a son who is in secondary school.

At this time, he works as a plumber in a water and sewage system company.  After 15 years of service, he has exhibited responsibility in his job.  

Eulalio is currently adding a room a room to his house.  He already has some construction materials, but he is requesting a Kiva loan through CEPRODEL to buy cement and steel, and to pay for some workers to add a room to his house.  He thanks CEPRODEL and KIVA for providing this support, because in this way he will be able to improve his house and provide better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies, such as cement and steel, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 37 años de edad casada, luchadora y emprendedora que de su matrimonio tiene 4 hijos los cuales viven bajo su mismo techo y dependen de ella 3 están estudiando en primaria en diferentes grados de educación y el mayor solo pudo cursar hasta el 6 grado por lo cual en familia se dedican a trabajar en su cultivo de café. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria no completado cursado hasta el primer curso y no pudo continuar por la falta de apoyo económico ya que sus padres son de bajos recursos económicos. Fueron ellos los que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra desde muy pequeña por lo cual esta actividad ha sido el único medio de ingreso para su familia y en la actualidad no deja de serlo ya que dicha actividad la ejerce junto a su esposo hace más de 8 años. Su producto es comercializado y vendido con los intermediarios que a la zona llegan por su adquisición y el terreno que ellos trabajan es propio gracias a una herencia que sus suegros le dieron a su esposo el cual está ubicado a 500 metros de distancia de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan a pie diariamente.           

Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos y otros productos que mantendrán sus cultivos libres de plagas y de enfermedades como la roya. 

Su sueño es poder aumentar su cultivo para que de esa manera obtener más ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos con sus estudios, que ellos tengan una mejor calidad de vida y sean personas preparadas a nivel universitario y se puedan defender en la vida con una carrera de provecho.
texts.en: María is a 37-year-old, fighting, enterprising woman who is married and has four children, all of whom live under the same roof and depend on her. Three of the children are in different grades of elementary school, and the youngest only went until the sixth grade before helping the family grow coffee. María went to school for a year but didn't complete it because of a lack of economic resources for her parents, who were poor. It was them who taught her how to work off the land since she was very young, and this activity has been the only source of income for the family. She has never stopped working, and now she has done the activity alongside her husband for more than eight years. She sells her products to agents who come to the area to make their purchases, and the land that they work on is their own thanks to an inheritance left by her in-laws for her husband. The land is located 500 meters from their home, and she and her husband walk there daily. She is requesting the loan to purchase fertilizers, manure and other products to keep her crops free of plagues and diseases. Her dream is to expand her crops so she can earn more income to help her children with their education, so that they have a better quality of life and can be prepared to go to college so they can go through life with the benefit of a degree.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and manure for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anna Marie

texts.en:
Anna Marie is 27 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail store in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over three years and earns 40,000 PHP every month.

She has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP. She will use it to purchase additional cellphone load to sell, such as Smart and Globe Prepaid, and other products. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional cellphone load to sell, such as Smart and Globe Prepaid, and other products

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
